## Ph. D. Candidate | Organizational Behavior & Theory
**Tepper School of Business, Carnegie Mellon University**

|
|

I am a PhD Candidate in Organizational Behavior and Theory at the Tepper School of Business studying the meso structures at work within organizations and across the world of work. My current stream of research explores processes of learning, performance, and emergent phenomenon in contexts of human-agent/AI teaming and interactions.
